subject: Playoff Games
Football
lead_paragraph: It has not taken Mark Sanchez long to reach rarefied air, but against the Steelers, he couldn’t replicate the late-game heroics he displayed in games against the Colts and Patriots.
snippet: It has not taken Mark Sanchez long to reach rarefied air, but against the Steelers, he couldn’t replicate the late-game heroics he displayed in games against the Colts and Patriots.
